changeSet.author: nahuel
changeSet.comment: Create column to store properties in json format. Aimed to replace nd_experimentprop

changeSet.author: vanina
changeSet.comment: Add trntype to ims_transaction table
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE ims_transaction ADD COLUMN trntype INT(11) NULL;

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: select count(1) from ims_transaction it WHERE trnstat = 1 AND trntype IS NULL AND comments = 'Stock taking adjustment';

changeSet.comment: Set transaction type for committed Stock taking adjustment
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ims_transaction SET trntype = 3 WHERE trnstat = 1 AND trntype IS NULL AND comments = 'Stock taking adjustment';

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: select count(1) from ims_transaction it WHERE trnstat = 1 AND trntype IS NULL AND (comments != 'Stock taking adjustment' OR comments IS NULL) AND trnqty >= 0;

changeSet.comment: Set transaction type for committed and not Stock taking adjustment, qty >= 0
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ims_transaction SET trntype = 4 WHERE trnstat = 1 AND trntype IS NULL AND (comments != 'Stock taking adjustment' OR comments IS NULL) AND trnqty >= 0;

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: select count(1) from ims_transaction it WHERE trnstat = 1 AND trntype IS NULL AND (comments != 'Stock taking adjustment' OR comments IS NULL) AND trnqty < 0;

changeSet.comment: Set transaction type for committed and not Stock taking adjustment, qty < 0
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ims_transaction SET trntype = 1 WHERE trnstat = 1 AND trntype IS NULL AND (comments != 'Stock taking adjustment' OR comments IS NULL) AND trnqty < 0;

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: select count(1) from ims_transaction it WHERE trnid IN (SELECT t.trnid FROM ims_transaction t INNER JOIN ims_lot l ON t.lotid = l.lotid WHERE t.trnstat = 1 AND l.status = 1 AND trnqty < 0 AND t.comments = 'Discard' AND t.trnid = (SELECT MAX(trnid) FROM ims_transaction tr WHERE tr.lotid = l.lotid));

changeSet.comment: Set transaction type for discard transaction when lot is closed
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ims_transaction SET trntype = 2 WHERE trnid IN (SELECT t.trnid FROM (select * from ims_transaction) t INNER JOIN ims_lot l ON t.lotid = l.lotid WHERE t.trnstat = 1 AND l.status = 1 AND trnqty < 0 AND t.comments = 'Discard' AND t.trnid = (SELECT MAX(trnid) FROM (select * from ims_transaction) as tr WHERE tr.lotid = l.lotid));

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: select count(1) from ims_transaction it WHERE (trnstat = 0 OR trnstat = 9) AND trntype IS NULL AND trnqty < 0;

changeSet.comment: Set transaction type for pending or cancelled transaction and qty < 0
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ims_transaction SET trntype = 1 WHERE (trnstat = 0 OR trnstat = 9) AND trntype IS NULL AND trnqty < 0;

changeSet.author: vanina

not.sqlCheck: select count(1) from ims_transaction it WHERE (trnstat = 0 OR trnstat = 9) AND trntype IS NULL AND trnqty >= 0;

changeSet.comment: Set transaction type for pending or cancelled transaction and qty >= 0
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ims_transaction SET trntype = 4 WHERE (trnstat = 0 OR trnstat = 9) AND trntype IS NULL AND trnqty >= 0;

changeSet.author: vanina

and.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS c WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'ims_transaction' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'trntype' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();

changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE ims_transaction CHANGE COLUMN trntype trntype INT(11) NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: vanina

and.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS c WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'ims_transaction' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'trnstat' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();

changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE ims_transaction CHANGE COLUMN trnstat trnstat INT(11) NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: vanina

and.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS c WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'ims_transaction' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'trnqty' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE();

changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE ims_transaction CHANGE COLUMN trnqty trnqty DOUBLE NOT NULL;
